abstract: James Poniewozik Critic's Notebook; cameras were cut off during Democratic sit-in over gun-control legislation, but C-Span improvised and other networks were able to televise by picking up live feeds that House members themselves shot on Periscope, Facebook Live and other social media platforms.

headline.print_headline: C-Span, Gun Control and a Protest That Used Social Media as Its Ally
headline.main: C-Span, Gun Control and a Protest Made for Streaming

snippet: The Democratic sit-in, captured mainly by smartphone video, had emotion, chaos, conflict and the frisson of unpredictable reality.
lead_paragraph: The Democratic sit-in, captured mainly by smartphone video, had emotion, chaos, conflict and the frisson of unpredictable reality.
